name: Assassin's Blessing
passives: Kill or Assist Jungle Monsters or Enemy Gods to gain stacks. Jungle Monsters are worth 1 stack and Enemy Gods are worth 5 stacks. At 50 Stacks Assassin's Blessing Evolves, gaining +5 Penetration and 5% Movement speed.
stat_changes: +7% Health and 25 Mana Restored on Killing a Jungle Monster
